City Venue Rentals
==================

Whether you are planning a small intimate party or a grand gala affair, the City of San Saba has venue rentals that can fit the bill! We offer both inside and outside settings for your next special occasion.

![](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/millpond-gazebo-background.jpg)

For City Park rentals
[,](https://sansabatexas.com/city-services/city-venue-rentals/#park-rentals)
please call City Hall 325-372-5144. For Civic Center rentals, please call the City Police Department at 325-372-6292.

* [City Venue Rentals](https://sansabatexas.com/city-services/city-venue-rentals/)




![San Saba logo](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/cropped-Logo-CITY-SS-2017-Cap-Pecan-Capital-1-1-1.png)

Hours of Operation
Monday – Thursday: 7:30am – 5:30pm
Friday: 7:30am – 11:30am
